products.title: Perforated Steel Filtra Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Perforated Steel Filtra Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Lusso Steel Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80205. A luxurious dim-out blind, produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
products.productdescription: HiveÂ LussoÂ Steel Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our HiveÂ privacy non-BlackoutÂ range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The Hive Lusso range has aÂ   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.Â

products.title: Titanium Silver Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Titanium Silver Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Vibe Grey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Vibe Grey Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The âASCâ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.Â  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee! Â This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.Â  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.Â
